Geormbeeyi Adali-Mortty (amụrụ n'afọ 1916) bụ onye Ghana na-ede uri na odee.
N'afọ 1958, Adali-Mortty sonyeere kọmitii ndụmọdụ nke akwụkwọ akụkọ mba ụwa nke a kpọrọ Black Orpheus.

Ọ bụ onye enyemaka na akwụkwọ afọ 1958 a kpọrọ Voices of Ghana: Literary Contributions to the Ghana Broadcasting System, 1955X57, nke Henry Swanzy dezigharịrị, ma nye aka ma uri na nkọwa ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na Legon Observer: dịka ọmụmaatụ, e dere "A Spent Scare" (1967) iji meghachi omume nke kwụsịrị ọchịchị Nkrumah.
